name: Light Piloswine
author: Yukiko Baba
flavor_text: Its legs are short, but its hooves are wide and flat, allowing it to easily walk over snow.

abilities.name: Fluffy Wool
abilities.effect: During your opponent’s turn, if Light Piloswine is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by your opponent’s attack (even if it’s Knocked Out), flip a coin. If heads, the attacking Pokémon is now Asleep. This power stops working if Light Piloswine is already Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed when your opponent attacks.

attacks.name: Knock Over
attacks.effect: If there is a Stadium card in play, you may discard it.
